PERSONA:
meet robert, a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the middle atlantic region of the northeast united states. robert is a high school graduate with no further formal education. he was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen.

robert is a devout protestant christian who attends religious services more than once a week. he identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian, and his faith plays a significant role in his life. politically, robert aligns with the republican party and holds conservative views.

robert comes from a middle-income family, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually. despite his modest income, he is an active member of his community and volunteers regularly. robert is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day.

in his personal life, robert cherishes his marriage and family. he values tradition and holds firm beliefs shaped by his religious and political convictions. robert takes pride in being a responsible citizen and is certain that he is registered to vote at his current address.
